Title: SQLWindow
Description: SQLWindow is simple database debugging and maintenance tool, which uses WPF and data binding
HomeWiki:
SQLWindow
SQLWindow is simple database debugging and maintenance tool, which uses WPF and data binding

This simple tool has two main purposes:
  • Provide a basic database operations by executing custom SQL queries (and even fetching some results!).
  • Show example on binding data in .NET WPF.

You can use it as standalone application to connect to database and ALTER CONSTRAINT, DROP TRIGGER or INSERT VALUES, etc.
On the other hand, if you develop database-oriented application, you can easily embed SQLWindow into your project as a reference.
